On Wed, 22 Sep 2004 19:09:45 +0200, Mario Kusek <mario.kusek@...> wrote:
> Have you tried to split your project to 3 subprojects:
> 
> - client
> - server and
> - common
> 
> Client and server subprojects depend on common subproject.

Yes, that is what we do.

> Each
> subproject has tests for the classes in that subproject and
> communication tests can be put in common where they can load client and
> server classes by diferent classloader.

Do you have any working examples of this?
